sourcesContent:
import uniqid from 'uniqid' import { certifications } from '../../portfolio' import './Certifications.css' const Certifications = () => { if (!certifications.length) return null return (

Certifications

{certifications.map((cert) => (

{cert.name}

{cert.issuer}
{cert.year}
Credential ID: {cert.credentialId}

{cert.description}

Certified
))}
) } export default Certifications
